Description: Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google for mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets. Android was released in 2007.
iOS is a mobile operating system launched in 2007 by Apple exclusively for its own hardware. It powers the company's mobile devices, including the iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch.

The Samsung implementation of Android encompasses aspects of Android OS devices sold by Samsung. Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google, based on the Linux kernel and designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.
